comment._content: "John Biddle (February 2, 1859 – January 18, 1936) was career United States Army officer who became superintendent of the United States Military Academy." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Biddle_%28United_States_Army_g...

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This photo is depicted in The Washington times., October 26, 1917, FINAL EDITION, Page 2 The Ogden standard., November 07, 1917, 4 P.M. CITY EDITION, Page 10 (with photo) confirms that he was appointed assistant chief of the army general staff.
